analysis.description:
R1Exchange.refund (/unique_chucks/4/0x353d92db08564500d812ddfd23a668d2f405ed85.sol#395-402) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- require(bool)(user.send(amount)) (/unique_chucks/4/0x353d92db08564500d812ddfd23a668d2f405ed85.sol)

R1Exchange.refund has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(user.send(amount)) (/unique_chucks/4/0x353d92db08564500d812ddfd23a668d2f405ed85.sol)

R1Exchange.refund has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(Token(token).transfer(user,amount)) (/unique_chucks/4/0x353d92db08564500d812ddfd23a668d2f405ed85.sol)

SafeMath.safeSub (/unique_chucks/4/0x353d92db08564500d812ddfd23a668d2f405ed85.sol#12-17) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- assert(bool)(_x >= _y) (/unique_chucks/4/0x353d92db08564500d812ddfd23a668d2f405ed85.sol#13-14)

R1Exchange.withdraw (/unique_chucks/4/0x353d92db08564500d812ddfd23a668d2f405ed85.sol#155-176) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/4/0x353d92db08564500d812ddfd23a668d2f405ed85.sol:
